TopicTitle: game crashes when i leave the solar system

Articles.Content:
game crashes when i leave the solar system

when i leave sols orbit, after a certain distance the path stops and when my craft gets there the game crashes

voyager 2 is made all stock parts besides some visual models like a radio dish and solar panels that are just models

what am i doing wrong?

edit: i passed the 200.000.000.000 mark now, (aka, i didn\'t crash the third time i tried) i successfully left orbit of the sun, and am moving in a relatively straight line at 10000 m/s

i aimed my radio dish at the earth to enable communication over range, my deep space telemetry antenni are searching for weak signals and sensors are picking up all kinds of strange anomalies as the edges of the solarsystem creeps slowly closer
might be the space kraken or leaving the map if there is one
